query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_docs, 
  SUM(CASE WHEN mimeType = 'application/pdf' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pdf_docs,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fileUrl LIKE '%.pdf%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pdf_urls,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fileUrl LIKE '%.docx%' OR mimeType LIKE '%word%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as remaining_docx
FROM documents;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total_docs, 
  SUM(CASE WHEN mimeType = 'application/pdf' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pdf_docs,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fileUrl LIKE '%.pdf%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pdf_urls,
  SUM(CASE WHEN fileUrl LIKE '%.docx%' OR mimeType LIKE '%word%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as remaining_docx
FROM documents;
